name: Central Park East II
electiveclasses: All CPE II students are involved with the Billion Oyster Project. BOP schools are satellite campuses for oyster research. Students monitor oysters and collect scientific data on water quality, oyster growth, and biodiversity. All participating teams follow the standard BOP Field Science protocols and procedures. The research goals are to better understand the factors affecting oyster survival, ecological services of oysters, and assess the health and ongoing restoration of NY Harbor.
